member.summary: A helper method that gets a configuration section using the new format (using single underscore) while being backward compatible with the dot-notation. Not to be used by new code - new code should always use a single underscore when naming configuration keys that require separating segments. Examples: Good: "OrchardCore_Media_Azure".
